rahasin thayilanthayata yawu shri lanka kantha wolibol kandayama 'binduwatama' wateyi susil premalal 17 wani aasiyanu jyeshta kantha wolibol tharagawaliya niyojanaya kirima sandaha ikuthda thayilanthaya bala pitathwa giya shri lanka kantha wolibol kandayama tharagawaliya niyojanaya karana lada ratawal 16 n 15 wani sthanayata pathwa meratata pamina siti. 1975 wasare prathama warata aarambha wu aasiyanu shuratha jyeshta kantha wolibol tharagawali wansha kathawa anuwa 7 warak shri lankawa ema tharagawaliya (1991 bankok tharagawaliye sita) niyojanaya kota athi athara eda meda thek shri lanka kantha kandayama labu pahalama sthanaya mewara labu 15 wani sthanaya wima wisheshathwayaki. 1991 wasaredi prathama warata shri lankawa adala tharagawaliya niyojanaya karamin 12 wani sthanayath 1993 wasaredi 14 wani sthanayath, 2001 wasaredi 9 wani sthanayath 2007 wasaredi 10 wani sthanayath, 2009 wasaredi 14 wani sthanayath, 2011 wasaredi 12 wani sthanayath dina gena atha. 1991 wasare shri lankawe pawathi dakunu aasiyanu krida uleledi pamanak shri lankawata parajaya wu indiyawa 1979 wasaredi 7 wani sthanayath 1991wasaredi 14 wani sthanayath dinagenaathi athara in anathuruwa 2005, 2009, 2011 saha mewara (2013) tharagawaliwaladi 11 wani sthanaya shri lankawa abhibawa akhandawa raka ganimata samathwima suwisheshi weyi. 17 wani aasiyanu shuratha jyeshta kantha wolibol tharagawaliya yatathe tharagawaliye mulika watayedi 'di' kandaya (shri lankawa, dakunu koriyawa, china thayipe saha miyanmaraya) niyojanaya kala shri lankawa sahabhagi wu tharaga thunen dekakma tharaga wata 3-0 washayen china thayipeta (lakunu 25-6, 25-6 saha 25-13) dakunu koriyawata (lakunu 25-8, 25-6 saha 25-7) parajaya wu athara miyanmaraya samaga tharagayedi shri lankawa tharaga wata 3-0 kin (lakunu 26-24, 25-17, 25-20) jaya gaththeya.
